categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: During a battle on the planet Stronghold, an extra-galactic species known as the Charon attacked the world. Forces of the Alliance to Restore the Republic repelled the invaders and destroyed the Charon's flagship, Desolate. Nevertheless, the Alliance suffered heavy losses. One of the few survivors was the Morellian–Human hybrid Tole Warren.
